Title: Requires counties outside of a city with a population of one million or more to allow voters to utilize any early voting site in the county
Summary: Requires counties outside of a city with a population of one million or more to allow voters to utilize any early voting site in the county.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to requiring counties outside of a city with a population of one million or more to allow voters to utilize any early voting site in the county
